title: RP Missing from account
body: I spent $35 on 5K RP. Used 975 for Zed, and 1350 for Project: Zed skin. Also purchased an IP boost for 3 days at 520 RP, but for some reason I only have 818 RP. If you do the math (975 + 1350 + 520 = 2854) What's going on?

replies.body: It actually fixed a couple of moments after I posted this, thanks for your help, though! Much appreciated.

I checked your account and I'm not seeing anything unusual with your RP balance. I think this may be a visual error.  Can you attempt to make a purchase (don't have to complete one) and let me know if the RP balance it shows is the same as you see on your profile?

Did you happen to click the Easter link scam that is going around?

If so, please refer to this post that an Arbiter made recently:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/4lKKg0n9-security-reminder-beware-of-scams-this-holiday
